section.title: Enhancing Your Samba Server
section.para: In this part, you will learn how to update your solution with some common server administration components using two different methods. These updates require changes to the config and packages elements already in place in your samba-server.definition file.

Following the illustrations in this section, you can conditionally configure applications in your solution, automate installation, create various install images, add business support required by the legal and software development departments and secure your system. All of these options utilize top-level elements that you include in your system system definition, samba-server.definition.
